job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

* Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on leveraging existing AI tools to improve efficiency in software development tasks like coding, error detection, and feature development. It mentions 'AI-driven innovations' and 'AI-driven solutions' but does not detail the development, fine-tuning, or deployment of core AI models (LLMs, diffusion models, etc.). The emphasis is on using AI as a productivity enhancer within a traditional software engineering context, rather than building AI systems themselves. This aligns with the definition of the 'Ambiguous' profile, which includes roles primarily focused on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity or traditional software engineering without core AI model development.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing', 'develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions', 'creating robust, cloud-native applications', and 'enhance product functionality'. These are all core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications' directly relates to building and deploying software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'code reviews' and 'collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards' are standard software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards

job_tasks.justification: Enhancing product functionality and integrating solutions are typical software development responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement' indicates an understanding of business goals and how technology can serve them.
job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement

soft_skills.phrase: coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing
